text.div: This value set includes all SNOMED CT codes relating to the qualifier "Known" (concepts with an is-a relationship with 36692007) for absent or "not present" codes.

name: Condition/Diagnosis Certainty
description: value set for Condition/Problem/Diagnosis certainty for absent or refuted occurrences
